channel.title: Hosting Problem
channel.description:
I have portforwarded and everything should i change the server ip in the client folder? to my no-ip ip/url or change the server ip to the host name? having troubles finding where to put the ip in order for people to play online.
Please help would be appreciated.

item.title: Hosting Problem
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

[quote=“ElmosWorld, post:1, topic:508541”]I have portforwarded and everything should i change the server ip in the client folder? to my no-ip ip/url or change the server ip to the host name? having troubles finding where to put the ip in order for people to play online.

Please help would be appreciated.[/quote]

Since you say you have portforwarded it and you say you want to host using no-ip then you should change the IP to the address you have gotten from no-ip.org

Read full topic
